DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see Stendra cause change vision , eye pressure , pupil dilation , color vision healthy male .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Looking Effects Stendra Vision
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study assess effect Stendra visual acuity , intraocular pressure , pupillometry , color vision discrimination healthy male subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male 18 45 year age , inclusive Nontobacco user least 6 month prior first dose History presence retinal disease vision defect include color vision Intraocular pressure value ≥ 22mm Hg Resting heart rate < 45 > 90 beat per minute ( 3 rechecks ) Systolic blood pressure < 90 > 140 mm Hg Diastolic blood pressure < 50 > 90 mm Hg ( 3 rechecks ) Initiation change dose αblockers 14 day prior randomization
